elementSpec.desc: A quotation from some other document, together with a bibliographic reference to its source.
從其他文件中引用的內容，並包含引用來源的書目參照資料。
多文書からの引用．元資料への書誌参照情報も含む．
una cita de algún otro documento, junto con una referencia bibliográfica a su fuente.

cit.quote: and the breath of the whale is frequently attended with such an insupportable smell, as to bring on disorder of the brain.

remarks.p: Must contain a single quote and a single bibliographic reference in either order
